description: Call Serp Search API with result limiting

serpapi_api_key.info: Your API key from serpapi.com for accessing search results.

search_params.info: Additional parameters for the search API (e.g., engine, location, language).

max_results.info: Maximum number of search results to return.

max_snippet_length.info: Maximum length of each result snippet in characters.

tool_description: Search for recent results using SerpAPI with result limiting

success.search_completed: Search completed successfully. Found {count} results for '{query}'

warnings.empty_query: Search query is empty. Please provide a search term.
warnings.empty_input: Search input is empty. Please provide a search query.
warnings.no_results: No search results found for query: '{query}'

errors.api_key_required: SerpAPI API key is required. Please provide your API key from serpapi.com.
errors.tool_creation_failed: Failed to create SerpAPI search tool: {error}
